"As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated," Eric Schmidt said on Thursday. So Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured.
